page.title: 07SCHOOL SUBJECTS
page.content: In{French}we learn the language of France,we mainly read from books but some times we have tests on verbs or words. In{Science}we are taught as much about the broad range of Science as possible. In{Maths}we try and do sums,geometry and algebra. In{English}our teacher teaches us to read,write and speak properly,and not to say things like "whot d'u fink yu doink". In{PE}which is short for physical education we do all sports such as athletics,soccer,rugby and gym work. In{Design}we do a wide range of things such as wood and metal work to needle craft,cooking and fabric work. In{Drama}we do acting which I think is to build up our self-confidence.
